title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Mission San Bernardo
body: Mission San Bernardo        Christopher Talbot       Mission San Bernardo ruins, Guerrero, Coahuila, Mexico Located just north of Guerrero in Mexico, construction of the mission church began in 1760 but was never completed. The outstanding ruins are virtually the only visible remains of the complex of missions established in the area. The purpose was to convert Coahuiltecan Indians.  Time period: 1700s Ownership: Public (City of Guerrero, Mexico)       A Photographic Journey of the Trail - NEXT IMAGE PREVIOUS IMAGE
